turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: (deleted)

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I'll like to order some pizzas from the new pizzeria Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, I'd like to order three medium pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what kind of toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. On pizza one, I want spicy Italian sausage and green olives. On pizza two, I want just pepperoni and extra cheese. And on pizza three, I'll take their supreme pizza with extra cheese as well.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, just to let you know there is an additional charge for extra cheese, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's fine. But I also need those three pizzas to have gluten-free crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i'll make a note of that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: one moment while i place that order for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, so you are ordering 3 gluten free medium pizzas, one with green olives and spicy italian sausage, one with pepperoni and extra cheese and one supreme with extra cheese, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's correct. Could you give me the total?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $60, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: will you be dining in, picking up or having your order delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll be dining in.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your receipt will be texted to you and your pizzas will be ready in 20 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that should cover it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.
